document_data.name: Arthylmas
document_data.mainbody: '''Arthylmas''' was a [[sage]] of the city of [[Saerloon]] in [[Sembia]] of the 13th century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the late 13th century DR, [[Kesten Orthalin]] of the [[Grimblades]] adventuring company had Arthylmas identify a [[short sword]] that had come into his possession. Arthylmas discovered it to be ''[[Sarghathuld]]'', a legendary relic of [[Roldilar]] and [[Impiltur]], and lost since [[1127 DR|the Year of the Luminar Procession, 1127 DR]], a century and a half before.{{Cite dragon/Soargar's Legacy|90}}
